info.title: Tumblr
info.description: Tumblr is a microblogging and social networking website. The service allows users to post multimedia and other content to a short-form blog.

get.description: Retrieves general information about the blog, such as the title, number of posts, and other high-level data.
Retrieve the blogs that the requested blog is currently blocking.

delete.description: Allows you to remove a block on a post by identifier.

post.description: Allows you to block a post by identifier.
Allows you to block a list of posts by identifier.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all likes for a blog.
Retrieve the publicly exposed list of blogs that a blog follows, in order from most recently-followed to first.
Retrieve a list of a blog's followers
Used to check if one of your blogs is followed by another blog.
Retrieves a list of the currently queued posts for the specified blog.

post.description: Allows you to reorder a post within the queue, moving it after an existing queued post, or to the top.
Randomly shuffles the queue for the specified blog.

get.description: Retrieve a list of draft posts.
Retrieve a list of submission posts.

target_tumblelog_uuid.description: The target tumblelog universally unique identifier.
target_tumblelog_uuid.title: Target Tumblelog UUID

from_tumblelog_uuid.description: The from tumblelog universally unique identifier.
from_tumblelog_uuid.title: From Tumblelog UUID

get.description: Retrieve the activity items for a specific blog, in reverse chronological order.

post.summary: Create or reblog a post (Neue Post Format)
post.description: Allows you to create posts and reblogs using the Neue Post Format.

parent_tumblelog_uuid.description: The parent tumblelog universally unique identifier.
parent_tumblelog_uuid.title: Parent Tumblelog UUID

parent_tumblelog_uuid.description: The parent tumblelog universally unique identifier.
parent_tumblelog_uuid.title: Parent Tumblelog UUID

put.description: Allows you to edit posts using the Neue Post Format.

post.description: Deletes a post by the identifier.

get.description: Retrieve a list of notes for a specific post.

show_header_image.description: Whether the header image is shown
show_header_image.title: Show Header Image

get.description: Retrieve information about the various user limits.
Retrieve the information in the user dashboard.
Retrieve the list of blogs the user is following.

post.description: Follow a blog by the URL or email address.
Unfollow a blog by the URL or email address.
Like a post by the post identifier and reblog key.
Unlike a post by post identifier and reblog key.

show_header_image.description: Whether the header image is shwon.
show_header_image.title: Show Header Image

get.description: Retrieve a list of posts with a given tag.
